show.title: Velvet Kutrangal
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/bPK6qd
show.description: A chain of events occurs when an Indian Embassy personnel gets key information about the missing flight. Different groups officially and unofficially try to access the classified and confidential codewords related to the event.
show.description_secondary: A chain of events occurs when an Indian Embassy personnel gets key information about the missing flight. Different groups officially and unofficially try to access the classified and confidential codewords related to the event.
